text: phir jab un ke paas hamaari taraf se haq aa pahoncha to kehte hai ke, ye wo kyo nahi diya gaya jaise diye gaye thein Mosa(alaihissalaam), accha to kya Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko jo kuch diya gaya tha, us ke saath logo ne kufr nahi kiya tha, saaf kaha tha ke ye duno jaadugar hai, jo ek dosre ke madadgaar hai aur hum to un sab ke munkir hai
